ygData.subject: New Paper on Minimal Criterion Coevolution: A New Approach to Open-Ended Search
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Jonathan Brant and I are pleased to announce our new GECCO Paper, Minimal Criterion Coevolution: A New Approach to Open-Ended Search.
